rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hallway that leads to the living area, with ample natural light from strategically placed windows following Vastu guidelines.
Spacious open-plan living room designed for relaxation and social gatherings. Large south-facing windows maximize daylight and ventilation.
Eco-friendly kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, integrated storage, and ample natural light from north-east facing window, adhering to Vastu principles for prosperity.
Compact bathroom with efficient water usage fixtures and a skylight for natural illumination, placed according to Vastu for balance.
Home theater designed with sound insulation, integrated seating, and low ambient lighting. Natural ventilation is maintained through strategically placed vents.

Studio apartment incorporating living, sleeping, and dining areas in a single open space with flexible partitions, ensuring an eco-friendly design by optimizing energy efficiency. Natural light is maximized using large windows.

openings.description: The main entrance door on the south side to invite positive energy in line with Vastu principles.
Large window facing east for morning light and fresh air.
North-east facing window to enhance natural light and ventilation in the kitchen.
Skylight for natural illumination in the bathroom.
Ventilation opening designed to allow airflow during movie sessions without compromising sound insulation.
